meanings.definition: Thin or narrow in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The tree branch was the slenderest one in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She picked the slenderest pencil from the box.
meanings.sent3: The slenderest cat in the neighborhood always gets stuck in the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as slenderest as a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The slenderest thread held the kite in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having a small or slight build.
meanings.sent1: The slenderest girl in the class was also the fastest runner.
meanings.sent2: He had the slenderest frame among his siblings.
meanings.sent3: The slenderest puppy in the litter was the most energetic.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers were the slenderest, perfect for playing the piano.
meanings.sent5: The slenderest model walked confidently on the runway.

meanings.definition: Showing elegance or grace in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She moved with the slenderest of grace on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina had the slenderest posture during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The slenderest swan glided across the lake with poise.
meanings.sent4: Her gown was the slenderest of all, flowing like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The slenderest flower in the garden bloomed with delicate beauty.
